title: The Writer's Covenant: Compositions and Compilations
description: The Writer’s The Writer’s Covenant is the definitive work on ‘how to build a compelling creative piece. It is also a requirement for all writers and creatives to know and master and refer back to for both inspiration and Guidance.The Writer’s ● Reference provides a wide discussion range for writers to return to when in need of inspiration and Guidance● How to it provides a step-by-step model for how to advance a creative work● Character provides a careful and analytic discussion of how characters can be formed up and mashed up● dives deep into the impact and progressions that conflict make and how to inch or race these along● plumbs the depths of evil and provides a template for how to rightly capture and properly present and wield this force● shows forth the expanse of goodness and the “Beyond Further” power and empowerment that goodness exacts and imparts to transform the drag of evil● Defining provides the writer the capacity to build proper retentive definition for their work
author: Steve Bonenberger
